name: Armored Assault (itch)
description:
I made this little tank game to get back into Unity and learn to actually code myself instead of watching youtube tutorials. I think I've learned a lot from it. I did eventually get a lot of burnout from this game so it isn't very finished.  There are two levels and a boss level. You can beat the game easily in 2 minutes. 

Note: There is a bug where you spawn in the wall, if this happens drive to the top left and you will get out.
